text: Mehdi Ouertani (; born 17 June 1990) is a Tunisian footballer who plays for MC Alger in the Algerian Ligue Professionnelle 1. Mehdi Ouertani has also the Algerian nationality from his mother, He is considered as a local player from the Algerian league. == References == ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1990 births Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Tunisian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Algeria Category:CA Bizertin players Category:Stade Tunisien players Category:AS Marsa players Category:Olympique Béja players Category:JS Kairouan players Category:NA Hussein Dey players Category:US Ben Guerdane players Category:MC Alger players Category:ES Métlaoui players Category:Association football defenders
title: Mehdi Ouertani
